LanguageData.Chickennest.label: Nido de pollo
LanguageData.Chickennest.description: Un pequeño nido para que los animales duerman. Se adapta a animales más pequeños como pollos, gatos o perros pequeños.
LanguageData.Chickennest_Blueprint.label: chicken nest (blueprint)
LanguageData.Chickennest_Blueprint_Install.label: chicken nest (blueprint)
LanguageData.Chickennest_Frame.label: chicken nest (building)
LanguageData.Chickennest_Frame.description: A small nest for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingHayLeather.label: Lugar de dormir de los animales
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingHayLeather.description: Una caja pequeña para que los animales duerman adentro. Se adapta a animales más pequeños como pollos, gatos o perros pequeños.
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingHayLeather_Blueprint.label: animal sleeping place (blueprint)
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingHayLeather_Frame.label: animal sleeping place (building)
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingHayLeather_Frame.descripti: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats or small dogs.
LanguageData.AnimalPillow.label: Almohada animal
LanguageData.AnimalPillow.description: Línea millenium-cama animal. Descanse y trate a sus amigos peludos cómodamente sobre la almohada. Repelente de pelo de las mascotas y fácil de limpiar.
LanguageData.AnimalPillow_Blueprint.label: animal pillow (blueprint)
LanguageData.AnimalPillow_Blueprint_Install.label: animal pillow (blueprint)
LanguageData.AnimalPillow_Frame.label: animal pillow (building)
LanguageData.AnimalPillow_Frame.description: Millenium Line animal bed. Rest and treat your furry friends comfortably on the pillow. Pet hair repellent and easy to clean.
LanguageData.FeedingBowl.label: Tazón de alimentación
LanguageData.FeedingBowl.description: Sus animales les encantará este tazón tanto que van a comer fuera de aquí primero!
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Blueprint.label: feeding bowl (blueprint)
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Blueprint_Install.label: feeding bowl (blueprint)
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Frame.label: feeding bowl (building)
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Frame.description: Your animals will love this bowl so much that they'll go eat out of here first!
LanguageData.ScratchingPole.label: Poste para rascarse
LanguageData.ScratchingPole.description: Proporciona a sus gatos un lugar para afilar sus garras.
LanguageData.ScratchingPole_Blueprint.label: scratching post (blueprint)
LanguageData.ScratchingPole_Blueprint_Install.label: scratching post (blueprint)
LanguageData.ScratchingPole_Frame.label: scratching post (building)
LanguageData.ScratchingPole_Frame.description: Provides your cats with a place to sharpen their claws.
